enum.name: TranslateLanguageVerification

int.label: (deprecated) Model is disabled
Model only (no Content-Language)
Model unkown (use Content-Language)
Model agrees with Content-Language
Model disagrees with Content-Language
Model overrides 'en' Content-Language

enum.int: If the model predicts a language in 'kWellKnownCodesOnWrongConfiguration' but the Content-Language is 'en' we use the model language.

int.label: Model compliments country code

enum.int: A country code is required for zh, use the model version if the page language does not include one.
